Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.idsite.IdSiteUrlBuilder

  • Packages that use IdSiteUrlBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.application  
    com.stormpath.sdk.idsite  
    com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.mvc  

    • Uses of IdSiteUrlBuilder in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application that return IdSiteUrlBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IdSiteUrlBuilder Application.newIdSiteUrlBuilder()
      Creates a new IdSiteUrlBuilder that allows you to build a URL you can use to redirect your application users to a hosted login/registration/forgot-password site - what Stormpath calls an 'Identity Site' (or 'ID Site' for short) - for performing common user identity functionality.

    • Uses of IdSiteUrlBuilder in com.stormpath.sdk.idsite

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.idsite that return IdSiteUrlBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteUrlBuilder.addProperty(String name, Object value)
      Convenience method to set any key value.
      IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteUrlBuilder.forLogout()
      A user that has an open session and wants to logout from it will invoke this method when constructing the callbackUri.
      IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteUrlBuilder.setCallbackUri(String callbackUri)
      Sets the location where the user will be sent when returning from the ID Site.
      IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteUrlBuilder.setOrganizationNameKey(String organizationNameKey)
      Ensures the ID Site is customized for the Organization with the specified organizationNameKey.
      IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteUrlBuilder.setPath(String path)
      Sets the initial path in the ID Site where the user should be sent.
      IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteUrlBuilder.setShowOrganizationField(boolean showOrganizationField)
      Ensures that the ID Site will show the organizationNameKey field to the end-user in the ID Site user interface.
      IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteUrlBuilder.setSpToken(String spToken)
      Sets the sp_token property used by the IdSite to complete an account password reset workflow.
      IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteUrlBuilder.setState(String state)
      Sets application-specific state that should be retained and made available to your callbackUri when the user returns from the ID Site.
      IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteUrlBuilder.setUseSubdomain(boolean useSubdomain)
      Ensures that the user will visit ID Site using a subdomain equal to the organizationNameKey instead of the standard base domain.

    • Uses of IdSiteUrlBuilder in com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.mvc

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.mvc that return IdSiteUrlBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected IdSiteUrlBuilder IdSiteController.createIdSiteUrlBuilder(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
